Rabbi Joe Black: Opening Prayer For the Colorado State House in the Aftermath of a Tragedy

On this tragic day when we confront the aftermath of the 18th School shooting in our nation on the 46th day of this year, I do not feel like praying. Our prayers have not stopped the bullets. Our prayers have changed nothing.

Fri, Feb 16, 2018 at 03:28pm
